entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:39 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 20.
